text: Ehle kitab mein se aksar log yeh chahte hain ke kisi tarah tumhein iman se pher kar phir kufr ki taraf palta le jayein agarche haqq unpar zaahir ho chuka hai, magar apne nafs ke hasad ki bina par tumhare liye unki yeh khwahish hai iske jawab mein tum afu o darguzar (forgive and overlook) se kaam lo, yahan tak ke Allah khud hi apna faisla nafiz karde. Mutmaeen raho ke Allah taala har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai
